plot: Victorita is a warm-hearted girl who was born to love. With her, there will be no place for coldness or lack of hope. A profound allegory about the lack of love, loneliness and the world of appearances.
title: Victorita, Victorita...
plot_es: Victorita is a warm-hearted girl who was born to love. With her, there will be no place for coldness or lack of hope. A profound allegory about the lack of love, loneliness and the world of appearances.
plot_en: Victorita is a warm-hearted girl who was born to love. With her, there will be no place for coldness or lack of hope. A profound allegory about the lack of love, loneliness and the world of appearances.
